rulings.ruling: Full Heal only affects your Active Pokemon, not benched Pokemon
Full Heal removes all Special Conditions simultaneously: Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, and Poisoned
If your Active Pokemon has no Special Conditions, Full Heal has no effect but can still be played
Full Heal does not remove damage counters, only Special Conditions
Full Heal does not prevent Special Conditions from being applied later
Status conditions from attacks that occur on the same turn Full Heal is used can still be applied afterward
Full Heal does not affect attack effects that aren't Special Conditions (like 'can't retreat' effects)
If your Active Pokemon is affected by multiple Special Conditions, Full Heal removes all of them
Full Heal can be played even if it would have no effect
